name: YueJi Dev Container
postCreateCommand: echo 'Waiting for DB...' && until pg_isready -h db -p 5432 -U yueji_user; do sleep 2; done && export PGPASSWORD=yueji_password && psql -h db -U yueji_user -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS yueji_db WITH (FORCE);" && psql -h db -U yueji_user -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE yueji_db;" && mvn exec:java -Dexec.mainClass="com.yueji.tool.DbInit"
